title: CuDNN v5 found, but i have cudnn6. How to fix?
body_html:
pytorch/aten/src/ATen/cudnn/cudnn-wrapper.h:9:198: note: #pragma message: CuDNN v5 found, but need at least CuDNN v6. You can get the latest version of CuDNN from https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn or disable CuDNN with NO_CUDNN=1
That is wrong. I have cudnn6. How i can fix it? Thanks
body_text:
pytorch/aten/src/ATen/cudnn/cudnn-wrapper.h:9:198: note: #pragma message: CuDNN v5 found, but need at least CuDNN v6. You can get the latest version of CuDNN from https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn or disable CuDNN with NO_CUDNN=1
That is wrong. I have cudnn6. How i can fix it? Thanks
body:
pytorch/aten/src/ATen/cudnn/cudnn-wrapper.h:9:198: note: #pragma message: CuDNN v5 found, but need at least CuDNN v6. You can get the latest version of CuDNN from https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn or disable CuDNN with NO_CUDNN=1
That is wrong. I have cudnn6. How i can fix it? Thanks
